about_the_game:
Deep within an abandoned research facility, a catastrophic experiment has transformed the scientists into zombified monsters, unleashing chaos within the once safe lab. Armed with a supply of highly volatile chemicals, you'll need to fight your way through a sprawling maze of interconnected rooms, splashing enemies with explosive elixirs and collecting various valuables.

Chemical Combat is an action-packed, chemistry-themed roguelike where strategy is key. Craft complex concoctions that trigger crazy chain reactions, battle your way through crowds of deadly monsters, and gather resources to upgrade your equipment. Survive, escape... or delve deeper for even greater rewards.

COMBINE CATALYTIC CHEMICALS 🧪

Combat here isn't just aimless shooting - it's about chaining the right reactions at the right times. Combine elements to ignite, corrode, freeze, and stun your foes, stacking reactions for even greater devastation. Refine and adapt your playstyle in order to conquer any challenge.

ENTER THE COMPLEX 🗺️

Each expedition takes you into a procedurally generated laboratory full of enemies, puzzles and traps - randomized layouts with risks and rewards around every corner. Navigate safely, as there's only one way out... unless you count death as a second.

MINE RARE MINERALS ⛏️

Construct and upgrade automated drills to passively mine materials between floors. Choose which elements to excavate, expand your arsenal, and experiment with an array of up to 16 unique elements. Be warned though: fuel isn't cheap, so you'll have to manage your resources carefully in order to maximize profits.

BATTLE BRUTAL BOSSES ☠️

Encounter deadly guardians at the exits to each floor. Defeat them to claim large bounties, permanent upgrades, and access to deeper levels, but beware - fighting these titans demands strategy, skill, and split-second reflexes, so there's no room for error.

PURCHASE POWERFUL PERKS ✨

Return to safety after each floor, where you'll have the opportunity to spend your hard-earned cash on various upgrades which significantly boost your damage, survivability, or can even enable entire new playstyles. The choice is yours, but invest wisely - difficulty never decreases...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB+ VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB+ VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible

short_description: Combine chemicals, prepare potions, and battle hordes of zombified scientists in this action-packed, chemistry-themed roguelike. You'll fight your way through a procedurally generated lab, exploding enemies and vaporising various vermin in order to purchase upgrades and drill for new elements.
